mapper.select: SELECT T.TABLE_NO , T.TABLE_NAME FROM TTABLE T WHERE T.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY T.TABLE_NO ASC

SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_SEQ , O.STORE_NO , O.TABLE_NO , O.MENU_NO , O.SALE_PRICE , O.QUANTITY , O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , O.ORDER_STATUS_NO , M.MENU_NAME FROM TORDER O , TMENU M WHERE O.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001' AND M.SALE_STATUS_NO = 'SS001' AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
